From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Plintissa stands before Dracona.

Plintissa: Dracona, please! Your the only friend I have!

Dracona: Correction, I was the only friend you had!

Artist was dragged around and beaten. Plintissa ran to him. Dracona laughed.

Dracona: Finish him, rip his spark out a bring it to me!

Stranato: What? You crazy or something?

Dracona: No! Bring his spark to me!

Stranato: I tried to kill before, I failed, I don't want to actually kill
someone!

Dracona: Fool! Sinesis, Sinister, reprogram them!

OCC: Stranato's good guy turn came from what I heard in wrestling, they say
they are going to turn Kurt Angle, American Hero, into a babyface wrestler!
Shocking, but it's true! It's true!

Sinesis and Sinister walk up to Stranato with the reprogram device. Someone
taps Sinister on the shoulder. He turns around. BAM! Stronghold's fist
connects with Sinister's face! Sinesis pulls out his blaster, but Blender
grabs it and rips it from his hand, taking his hand with it! Sinister is
grabbed by Train Wreck. Train Wreck lifts him up and Powerbomb's him through
a tree. Airbomber jumps from the top of a tree and lands on Dracona,
knocking her over. Dracona and Airbomber exchange punches. Sinesis is
whipped into a tree by Stronghold. Stronghold grabs Siensis by the legs and
lifts him up. Blender jumps up and grabs Sinesis' neck, 3D!!! Blender raised
his hands up in a sign for the Diamond Cutter. Stronghold smashed Sinister
through another tree with a Diving shoulder block. Blender hits a Diamond
Cutter on Sinesis. Arrow slices off a tree limb and Sinesis is pinned under
it. Stranato charges Sinister and grabs him, hitting a ferocious Olympic
Slam on Sinister. Dracona shoves Airbomber away finally and looks at Sinesis
and Sinister, just laying there...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 24, 2000 10:41 AM
Subject: Re: The Rescue


>
> * Iron Raptor sighed and rolled her optics in frustration, but she knew to
that Prowl loved her and was thinking of her safety.
> Some how knowing that she was thinking of running off in a completely
different direction that they did, fixing it so that her own signature would
seem like all four of them while she made sure that the other three
signatures weren't able to be detected. The sensor ghosts disappearing so
that they would only detect her.
> Though, since she wasn't going to exit with the others, she was going to
exit through the front door.
> With a second sigh she then fixes him with a determined and stern stare,
hoping that he would listen to her then despite what doubts he had in his
spark.*
>
> " PROWL! Do you think that I'm so incompetent that I can't look after
myself?!"
>
> * She shook her head.*
>
> " I know better to let them get me by surprise again. But I just ask you
to do this simple task for me this one time and you say, ' No'?"
>
> * She walked up to him and placed a gentle hand on his cheek with a sigh,
pleading very visible in her own optics.*
>
> " I know you're worried about me, Prowl. But it's time to think with your
head...and not your spark."
>
>
>
